author: Staff Reporter
text:
Praveena (26), a woman constable attached to the Armed Reserve police, allegedly committed suicide in her house at Nathapattu near here on Saturday.

A family dispute is suspected to have driven her to take the extreme step. Police sources said Praveena was married to Anandaraj for six years and the couple have a girl child.

According to police, Praveena was alone in the house. Neighbours found the door to her house locked. When they broke it open they found her hanging.

They immediately rushed Praveena to the Cuddalore Government Hospital where doctors pronounced her dead on arrival.
title: Woman constable commits suicide
